alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Beartooth Foothills; Crazy Mountains; Golden Valley; Judith Gap; Livingston Area; Melville Foothills; Musselshell; Northern Carbon; Northern Park; Northern Rosebud; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Paradise Valley; Red Lodge Foothills; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 04 at 4:09PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts will impact portions of Stillwater, eastern Wheatland, northwestern Carbon, Musselshell, west central Yellowstone, Golden Valley, Sweet Grass, northern Rosebud and central Park Counties through 530 PM MDT... At 406 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking thunderstorms producing strong wind gusts along a line extending from 11 miles south of Grass Range to 21 miles north of Gardiner. Movement was east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 60 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong winds may arrive well ahead of any rain or thunder. Locations impacted include... Livingston, Columbus, Roundup, Big Timber, Harlowton, Laurel, Ryegate, Melstone, Deadmans Basin Reservoir, Absarokee, Musselshell, Broadview, Lavina, Chico Hot Springs, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Mc Leod, Cooney Reservoir State Park and Pine Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
